name: Disassembly 3D
description: Love taking things apart? Seeing how things work? Destroying stuff? This game lets you do so! Plus you can blow it up at the end! Disassembly 3D: Ultimate Stereoscopic Destruction simulates the experience of taking everyday objects apart. Remove screws, bolts, nuts and every single part with your bare hands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
